Our guide to selling your home

Sell with a local, friendly estate agent

Get an accurate market appraisal of your property and find out exactly how much it's worth!

How to sell your home

1. Make your home look its best

When you make the decision to sell your home, agents will establish pricing for the property. Think about whether you’d like to stay in the same area, too: we’ll be able to advise you on the market around the region.

2. Get your property valued

We recommend putting your house on the market before making an offer on a house you’d like to buy. Make sure your home is looking its absolute best so you can attract potential buyers.

3. Get the property on the market

Once we’ve determined the terms and conditions, we can then finalise the marketing approach.

4. Carry out viewings

We always advise the agent to carry out the viewings; people often feel more comfortable giving honest feedback to agents.

5. Review any feedback

Any feedback we receive will be passed on to you promptly.

6. Receive offers to buy

When an offer is received, the agent will check and vet the potential buyer, finance, and chain and discuss the next steps with the seller. We’ll work on your behalf to get you the best possible offer from the best possible buyer.

7. Accept an offer

When the offer is accepted, it’s time to engage with a solicitor. We will send the Memorandum of Sale to all relevant parties in order for the sale to progress.

8. Progressing the sale

We will communicate with all professional parties involved i.e. solicitors, surveyors, estate agents and report back to you on a regular basis.

We believe that communication is KEY to a stress-free sale!

We will not stop until the property has successfully exchanged and completion had taken place.

9. Exchange of contracts

On the lead up to the exchange of contracts and when the transaction is imminent, you need to engage with removal companies.

We can recommend a range of local removal companies if required.

10. Completion

Your solicitor will contact us when the funds are received in their account and then we can legally hand over the keys to your new property!

The transaction is then complete.

Start selling your home today!
